text: Inside Man is a 2006 American heist thriller movie directed by Spike Lee and written by Russell Gewirtz. It is about a bank heist on Wall Street. It stars Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Willem Dafoe. ==References== Category:2006 movies Category:2006 thriller movies Category:American heist movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Spike Lee Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Inside Man
